title: Dalysian Struggle
description: An ancient competition. Only one race will survive.After Sophie’s win of the Dalysian Test, the next competition is not far out. The stakes of the infamous Trials are high, as Sophie is the only person standing in the way of the ruthless Cetoan tribe eradicating humans in the world. Add the fact that people want to kill her and a surprising invitation into the lion’s den and things seem to go sideways before the competition even started. Worst of all, her biggest opponent turns out to be her greatest weakness. What do you do when you don’t know who you can trust anymore? How do you keep going when faith threatens to leave you? With the Trials looming, Sophie has to find a way to beat the odds stacked against her because failure is not an option. If you like the water magic of Percy Jackson and the thrill of the Hunger Games, take a chance on this second installment of the Dalysia trilogy.
author: Jamie Summer
